Skill Points are one of the most important things for your character progression and efficiency. Another important thing is that all the Skill Points you getting are server-wide, which means that all your new characters on the same server will also get them. Of course, it is not easy to get them. In order to do so, you will need to participate in a range of in-game activities, which will certainly take a lot of time and effort.
Luckily, the
Skycoach
pro-team is here to help you! Let the professionals do the job: our pro-players will complete any activity that you choose and collect all available Skill Points in no time! Opt for our Lost Ark Skill Points Potions carry and actually enjoy the game!
Options:
Adventurer’s Tome: our team will complete Atlas progression in the following regions: East Luterra, North Vern, Shushire, Rohendel, and Punika, thus collecting all available Skill Point potions as well as other Adventurer's Tome rewards.
Quests: our player will complete the following quests: The Wayward Son, The Stone of Power, Tower for Shadows, Tower of Destiny, and the 2nd Awakening questline, thus collecting all available Skill Point potions.
Giant Hearts and Island Tokens: our player will collect 4 Giant Hearts and 20 Island Tokens thus collecting 6 Skill Point potions.
Tower of Shadows and Tower of Destiny: our player will progress to the 50-th floor of both towers collecting two Skill Point potions for each tower.
NOTE: Options are divided based on their item-level requirements.
